channel.title: Other chat commands?
channel.description:
I love the /w whisper command. Was wondering if there were any others than could make it so I have to mouse around even less.
Are there commands to open your journal or use an ability or move the cursor to the chat bar?
If i could hit something to open journal, type what I was gonna do, hit something to close journal, hit something to put my curser in the chat bar, and type out /n 13 to use my first ability on 13 that night thatd be much better than moving my mouse around every time I wanna open close or start typing. Also a command like /a 2 to accuse 2 during the day?
I know it sounds lazy and stuff but when you type fast it is so much better to be able to do a lot with chat commands.

item.title: Other chat commands?
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
yeah, thats what i meant

Read full topic

item.title: Other chat commands?
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
Well you would want /execute and /pardon too since that’s what they’re technically called

Read full topic

item.title: Other chat commands?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
so CW tornado would be: /n1 3 4

And private matters would be: /d2

Read full topic

item.title: Other chat commands?
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
i agree, but with some particulars:
/journal or /j - journal
(escape key to close it)
/a or /accuse [player number or name] to accuse
/guilty and /innocent (maybe /g and /i) for obvious
/n[ability number from left to right] or /night[same condition] [1st targets name/number] [second targets name/number] for night abilities
/d or /day, with same format above for day abilities

just to make it specific

Read full topic
